p.d: Author of over eighty works, including "The Lion" and "The Horsemen", Joseph Kessel expected to become an actor. He became a special correspondent, fighter pilot, writer, resistance fighter, Académie Française member... Portrait of an indefatigable adventurer, dying in 1979, inhabited by an inexhaustible life force and a touch of magic. Directed by: Marie Brunet-Debaines (France, 2019)
